verses.text: And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* gathered themselves \w together|strong="H0622"\w* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* into the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* that \add was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*; and they \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* both of \w men|strong="H0376"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and all that could \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* with \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*, upon the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.\f + \fr 8.2 \ft that…: Heb. that understood in hearing\f*

And he \w read|strong="H7121"\w* therein \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* that \add was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* from the \w morning|strong="H0216"\w* until \w midday|strong="H4276"\w*, before the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* and the \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and those that could \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*; and the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add were attentive\add* unto the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 8.3 \ft from…: Heb. from the light\f*

And \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* upon a \w pulpit|strong="H4026"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, which they had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w purpose|strong="H1697"\w*; and \w beside|strong="H0681"\w* him \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w Mattithiah|strong="H4993"\w*, and \w Shema|strong="H8087"\w*, and \w Anaiah|strong="H6043"\w*, and \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w*, and \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, and \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, on his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*; and on his left \w hand|strong="H8040"\w*, \w Pedaiah|strong="H6305"\w*, and \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w*, and \w Malchiah|strong="H4441"\w*, and \w Hashum|strong="H2828"\w*, and \w Hashbadana|strong="H2806"\w*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \add and\add* \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*.\f + \fr 8.4 \ft pulpit…: Heb. tower of wood\f*

And \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; (for he was above all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;) and when he \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* it, all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* stood \w up|strong="H5975"\w*:\f + \fr 8.5 \ft sight: Heb. eyes\f*

And \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, with lifting \w up|strong="H4607"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: and they \w bowed|strong="H6915"\w* their heads, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* with \add their\add* \w faces|strong="H0639"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

Also \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, and \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*, and \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w Jamin|strong="H3226"\w*, \w Akkub|strong="H6126"\w*, \w Shabbethai|strong="H7678"\w*, \w Hodijah|strong="H1941"\w*, \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w Kelita|strong="H7042"\w*, \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, \w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w*, \w Pelaiah|strong="H6411"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, caused the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add stood\add* in their \w place|strong="H5977"\w*.

So they \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w distinctly|strong="H6567"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H7760"\w* the \w sense|strong="H7922"\w*, and caused \add them\add* to \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* the \w reading|strong="H4744"\w*.

¶ And \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w Tirshatha|strong="H8660"\w*, and \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \w taught|strong="H0995"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w* not, nor \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*. For all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, when they \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 8.9 \ft the Tirshatha: or, the governor\f*

Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Go your \w way|strong="H3212"\w*, \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fat|strong="H4924"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* the \w sweet|strong="H4477"\w*, and \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w* unto them for whom nothing is \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*: for \add this\add* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* unto our \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*: neither be ye \w sorry|strong="H6087"\w*; for the \w joy|strong="H2304"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is your \w strength|strong="H4581"\w*.

So the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w stilled|strong="H2814"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Hold your \w peace|strong="H2013"\w*, for the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*; neither be ye \w grieved|strong="H6087"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* went their \w way|strong="H3212"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and to \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w*, and to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w mirth|strong="H8057"\w*, because they had \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that were \w declared|strong="H3045"\w* unto them.

¶ And on the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, unto \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, even to \w understand|strong="H7919"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.\f + \fr 8.13 \ft to understand…: or, that they might instruct in the words of the law\f*

And they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, that the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* should \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w booths|strong="H5521"\w* in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*:\f + \fr 8.14 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*

And that they should \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* and \w proclaim|strong="H5674"\w* in all their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* unto the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w fetch|strong="H0935"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w branches|strong="H5929"\w*, and \w pine|strong="H8081"\w* \w branches|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w myrtle|strong="H1918"\w* \w branches|strong="H5929"\w*, and \w palm|strong="H8558"\w* \w branches|strong="H5929"\w*, and \w branches|strong="H5929"\w* of \w thick|strong="H5687"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w booths|strong="H5521"\w*, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*.

¶ So the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add them\add*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* themselves \w booths|strong="H5521"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* upon the roof of his \w house|strong="H1406"\w*, and in their \w courts|strong="H2691"\w*, and in the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and in the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and in the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

And all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of them that were come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* out of the \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w booths|strong="H5521"\w*, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* under the \w booths|strong="H5521"\w*: for since the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w* unto that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* had not the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* done \w so|strong="H6213"\w*. And there was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*.

Also \w day|strong="H3117"\w* by \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, from the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* unto the \w last|strong="H0314"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, he \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And they \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; and on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add was\add* a solemn \w assembly|strong="H6116"\w*, according unto the \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 8.18 \ft a solemn…: Heb. a restraint\f*
